item.title: devgianlu
item.description: My name is Gianluca, I am co-founder of the havce CTF team and 2021 @cyberteamitaly member. Rev and mobile enthusiast. Website Github Twitter
item.content:
My name is Gianluca, I am co-founder of the havce CTF team and 2021 @cyberteamitaly member. Rev and mobile enthusiast.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hello, World! Finally we have our little corner on the internet. We will post our CTF writeups, rants and our activities. If you wanna hang with us, enter our Discord server. If you can find the invite link. Follow us on Twitter or on GitHub! If you wanna say hello, shoot us an email at: echo "aW5mb0BoYXZjZS5pdAo=" | base64 -d
item.content:
Hello, World! Finally we have our little corner on the internet. We will post our CTF writeups, rants and our activities.

If you wanna hang with us, enter our Discord server. If you can find the invite link.

Follow us on Twitter or on GitHub! If you wanna say hello, shoot us an email at: echo "aW5mb0BoYXZjZS5pdAo=" | base64 -d

item.title: Who we are
item.description: We are a group of people who like to break stuff, learn about cybersecurity and enjoy anolinis with Parmigiano Reggiano. We are also the official CTF team of the University of Parma, you can find us on CTFTime. havce was created in 2021, after the 2021 edition of CyberChallenge.IT. havce is currently composed by: Gianluca Altomani, @devgianlu Manuel Romei, @kriive Giovanni Spadaccini, @giospada Francesco Ciociola, @Kekko01 Riccardo Versetti, @verso1
item.content:
We are a group of people who like to break stuff, learn about cybersecurity and enjoy anolinis with Parmigiano Reggiano. We are also the official CTF team of the University of Parma, you can find us on CTFTime. havce was created in 2021, after the 2021 edition of CyberChallenge.IT.

havce is currently composed by:

  • Gianluca Altomani, @devgianlu
  • Manuel Romei, @kriive
  • Giovanni Spadaccini, @giospada
  • Francesco Ciociola, @Kekko01
  • Riccardo Versetti, @verso1
